description: A massive ship resembling a giant aquarium, serving as Breed's base of operations. The ship features walk-through aquarium hallways, underwater docking facilities, and holding cells for captured creatures and prisoners.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Breed's Ship-Island
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Law, and Chopper arrive at Breed's unique aquarium-ship via the Shark Submerge III through an underwater entrance.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the primary setting for the Caesar Retrieval Arc.

keyEvents.title: Battle in the Aquarium Hallways
keyEvents.description: The heroes are attacked by Breed's army of controlled animals in the ship's walk-through aquarium sections.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the ship's unique design and Breed's animal army.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Imprisoned on the Ship
keyEvents.description: Caesar is shown locked in a cage with Seastone handcuffs in one of the ship's holding areas.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the ship as a prison for Breed's captives.

statusHistory.reason: Ship serves as Breed's base during the Caesar Retrieval Arc

name.japanese: シャークサブマージ3号

description: A three-man submarine shaped like a shark, built by Franky as part of the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Docking System. It has a diving limit of 5,000 meters and maintains contact with the main ship via Den Den Mushi.

keyEvents.title: Pursuit in the Shark Submerge III
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Law, and Chopper board the submarine to pursue Breed and retrieve Caesar Clown.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance and usage of this vehicle, showcasing Franky's engineering skills.

keyEvents.title: Law Calls Chopper 'Tanuki-ya'
keyEvents.description: While traveling in the submarine, Law refers to Chopper as 'Tanuki-ya', creating a humorous moment.
keyEvents.significance: Character interaction moment in the confined submarine space.

statusHistory.reason: Submarine is part of the Thousand Sunny's equipment

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using wood from the legendary Adam Tree. A large brigantine-sloop with a lion figurehead and powered by both sails and Coup de Burst.

keyEvents.title: Sea Lapahns Attack the Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: While the crew is on watch for Doflamingo, Breed launches a surprise attack on the ship with his army of Sea Lapahns.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes the site of the initial conflict with Breed.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Kidnapped from the Sunny
keyEvents.description: Breed successfully infiltrates the ship and kidnaps Caesar Clown while the crew is distracted.
keyEvents.significance: The security breach drives the plot of the arc.
